::DarkMouse::

Her body shook, but it was lessening.  She opened her eyes and looked 
about.  Her vision was somewhat blurred.  She saw a figure standing 
near by.  She tried to talk, but she could only whisper,"where am I? 
who are you?"  She felt another pulse of energy surge through her and 
her body shook violently for a bit.  She closed her eyes and waited 
for the shaking to stop.  She could still feel pain in her arms from 
the tubes.  She tried to move her arms and legs, but they would not 
respond.  She felt a single tear run down her cheek.  She wanted to 
stop shaking and get up, but her body wouldn't listen to her.  She 
felt fear, cold,pain, and sorrow all at once.  She couldn't 
understand why this was happeneing.  She was starting to forget her 
trip to the Matrix.  She could remember a voice from somewhere, but 
the memory was fading.  She  felt her body stop shaking and now was a 
only shivering slightly.  She felt her spark pound in her chest.  she 
opened her eyes and her vision was clear this time.  She saw Black 
Aracnia near her.  She tried to smile.  She 
whispered, "black....arac....nia"  her voice jsut wouldn't come out 
like she wanted it too.  Her body felt cold, now damp, and heavy to 
her.  She just looked at Black Aracnia, not being able to speak at 
the moment.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia saw the mouse awaken. It had taken long enough. 
Now, she 
> had to wait until the spasams stoped and then, of course, she would 
need to 
> be in bed for a day or so. At least now Aracnia could relax.
